title: Reel Editor - $3/hr
job_overview:
We're looking for a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor to help us turn raw footage into engaging short-form video content for Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts. You’ll work closely with our content production team to repurpose podcast clips, behind-the-scenes Upgrade to see actual infonts, and business tips into high-performing social media videos.

Qualifications:
-Strong experience editing short-form content (Reels, Shorts, TikToks)
-Proficiency in software such as CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, or Final Cut Pro
-Experience with auto-caption tools (e.g., Captions App, Upgrade to see actual info, CapCut)
-Creative eye for storytelling and pacing
-Good communication skills and reliability
-Strong organizational habits for naming files and working in shared drives
-Bonus: basic design skills (Canva, Photoshop) or interest in AI tools

Responsibilities:
-Edit short-form vertical videos (15–90 seconds) using raw footage provided
-Add subtitles, emojis, animations, jump cuts, zooms, and engaging sound effects
-Follow our brand guidelines and editing style templates
-Source background music (royalty-free) when needed
-Upload final videos to shared folders with proper naming conventions
-Collaborate with our team via ClickUp or Notion on task updates and feedback
-Meet 24–72h turnaround times per batch depending on deadlines
-Stay updated with social media trends, Upgrade to see actual info culture, and audio trends
